requirements.summary: Build modern homepage with hero section, navigation, and featured updates from all categories
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays a compelling hero section
Navigation allows access to all five main sections
Latest updates from each category are visible on homepage
Design is responsive and works on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create homepage component with hero section using generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png, navigation cards to Jobs/Results/Admit Cards/News/Schemes sections, and featured updates grid displaying latest items from each category using backend query functions getLatestJobListings, getLatestExamResults, getLatestAdmitCards, getLatestNewsUpdates, and getLatestGovernmentSchemes

Create header component with portal logo using generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_120x120.png, site title, and navigation links to Jobs, Results, Admit Cards, News, and Schemes pages with responsive mobile menu

Create hero section component with background using generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png, portal title, tagline explaining purpose, and call-to-action buttons linking to main sections

Create featured updates component displaying latest items from all five categories (jobs, results, admit cards, news, schemes) in a grid layout with category icons using generated images frontend/public/assets/generated/jobs-icon.dim_96x96.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/results-icon.dim_96x96.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/admit-card-icon.dim_96x96.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/news-icon.dim_96x96.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/schemes-icon.dim_96x96.png
Add route for HomePage component at root path '/' and ensure header component is rendered on all pages

requirements.summary: Create Jobs section page with card-based layout and filtering by qualification, location, organization, and deadline status
acceptanceCriteria: Job listings display in an organized card layout
Users can filter jobs by multiple criteria
Each job card shows key information including deadline and vacancy count
Clicking a job card shows detailed information
Active jobs are visually distinguished from closed ones

file_operations.description: Create jobs page component that fetches job listings using getLatestJobListings backend function, displays jobs in card grid layout, implements filtering controls for qualification, location, organization, and application deadline status (active/closed based on applicationEndDate), and handles job card click to show details modal

Create job card component displaying job title, organization name, post name, vacancy count, application deadline, location, and visual indicator for active vs closed status based on applicationEndDate compared to current date
Create job filters component with dropdown/select controls for filtering by qualification, location, organization, and deadline status with clear filters button
Create job details modal component showing complete job information including all fields from JobListing type with link to official website and formatted dates
Add route for JobsPage component at path '/jobs'

requirements.summary: Create Results section page with searchable list and filtering by organization and date
acceptanceCriteria: Results are displayed in a clear, scannable format
Users can search and filter results
Result links are prominently displayed
Recent results appear at the top

file_operations.description: Create results page component that fetches exam results using getLatestExamResults backend function, displays results in list/table format sorted by resultDeclarationDate descending, implements search by exam name and filters for organization and date range
Create result card component displaying exam name, organization, result declaration date, roll number range, category info, and prominent result link button
Create result filters component with search input for exam name, organization dropdown filter, and date range picker for filtering by result declaration date
Add route for ResultsPage component at path '/results'

requirements.summary: Create Admit Cards section page with filters and highlighting for upcoming exams
acceptanceCriteria: Admit cards are organized chronologically
Upcoming exams are highlighted with visual emphasis
Download links are clearly accessible
Important instructions are visible without clicking through

file_operations.description: Create admit cards page component that fetches admit cards using getLatestAdmitCards backend function, displays admit cards sorted by examDate, highlights upcoming exams (examDate >= current date) with visual emphasis, and implements filters for exam date and organization
Create admit card component displaying exam name, organization, admit card release date, exam date, download link button, important instructions preview, and visual highlighting for upcoming exams
Create admit card filters component with organization dropdown filter and exam date range picker
Add route for AdmitCardsPage component at path '/admit-cards'

requirements.summary: Create News section page with blog-style layout, category filters, and search
acceptanceCriteria: News items display with headline, summary, and date
Users can filter news by category
Search allows finding specific news items
External links to full articles are provided

file_operations.description: Create news page component that fetches news updates using getLatestNewsUpdates backend function, displays news in blog-style card layout sorted by publicationDate descending, implements search by headline/summary and category filter
Create news card component displaying headline, summary, publication date, source, category badge, and link to external article
Create news filters component with search input for headline/summary and category dropdown filter
Add route for NewsPage component at path '/news'

requirements.summary: Create Schemes section page with detailed card format and filtering by ministry and eligibility
acceptanceCriteria: Schemes display with name, ministry, and brief description
Users can filter schemes by ministry and eligibility criteria
Each scheme card shows key benefits and application process overview
Clicking a scheme reveals full details including official website link

file_operations.description: Create schemes page component that fetches government schemes using getLatestGovernmentSchemes backend function, displays schemes in card grid layout, implements filters for ministry/department and eligibility criteria, and handles scheme card click to show details modal
Create scheme card component displaying scheme name, ministry/department, brief description, key benefits summary, and application process overview
Create scheme filters component with ministry/department dropdown filter and eligibility criteria search/filter input
Create scheme details modal component showing complete scheme information including all fields from GovernmentScheme type with link to official website and formatted launch date
Add route for SchemesPage component at path '/schemes'

requirements.summary: Design portal with professional aesthetic using orange and teal color scheme, clean typography, generous whitespace, and accessibility-compliant contrast
acceptanceCriteria: Orange and teal colors are consistently applied across all pages
Typography is readable and professional
Layout uses whitespace effectively for visual clarity
Design conveys trust and official authority
All text meets WCAG contrast requirements

file_operations.description: Define CSS custom properties for vibrant orange and deep teal color scheme inspired by Indian government portals, establish professional sans-serif font stack, set base typography styles with generous line-height for readability, ensure all color combinations meet WCAG AA contrast requirements for accessibility

Extend Tailwind theme with custom orange and teal color palette (primary, secondary, accent shades), add custom spacing utilities for generous whitespace, configure font family with modern sans-serif stack, add custom shadow utilities for subtle depth
Create layout wrapper component that applies consistent spacing, background colors, and structure across all pages with proper padding and max-width constraints for optimal readability
Wrap all routes with Layout component to ensure consistent design application across the portal
